Class ComponentComposite

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject

              com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.ComponentComposite
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class ComponentComposite
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

A GWT Composite subclass that handles GXT lazy rendering. This class is intended to only be used when working with the GWT Composite widget. The GXT Composite us preferred as it is a GXT Component subclass.

The class should be used when wrapping a component in a GWT Composite class.

See Also:
Composite, WidgetComponent
